official_title: A bill to provide that filing and miscellaneous fees for the United States District Court for the District of Columbia shall be collected in the same manner as such fees are collected for the other district courts in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the judicial code to provide that filing and miscellaneous fees for the U.S. District Court for the District of Columbia shall be collected in the same manner as other fees are collected for the other U.S. district courts.

titles.title: A bill to provide that filing and miscellaneous fees for the United States District Court for the District of Columbia shall be collected in the same manner as such fees are collected for the other district courts in the United States.
